title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.7 - Littering
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.7 - Littering

State Regulations

No person shall throw, dump, deposit or place, or cause to be
thrown, dumped, deposited or placed, any refuse, litter or material of any kind
and nature upon the facilities, except in containers specifically provided for
litter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5705.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
